channel.description: Recent content in Postgresql on {code that works}

item.title: Viewing Sequence ownership information in Postgres
item.description: This blog post is an exercise in identifying all the sequences in a PostgreSQL database that is associated with a table column via an OWNED BY relationship. Figuring out how to do this was harder than it should have been and this journals my understanding of it.
